title: Do you have Definition of Ready criteria`s to take user story in sprint?
Do you have Definition of Done for user stories and sprint?
Does team track sprint burn-down chart?
Does team deliver software to the customer at the end of every sprint?
Is your sprint/iteration duration less or equal to 2 weeks?
Do you have backlog grooming/refinement before sprint starts?
Are stories accepted by customer/product owner within the sprint?
